solution_line_template: In one week he will have saved {initial_savings}+{weekly_increase}=<<{initial_savings}+{weekly_increase}={week1_savings}>>{week1_savings} dollars
In two weeks he will have saved {week1_savings}+{weekly_increase}=<<{week1_savings}+{weekly_increase}={week2_savings}>>{week2_savings} dollars
In three weeks he will have saved {week2_savings}+{weekly_increase}=<<{week2_savings}+{weekly_increase}={week3_savings}>>{week3_savings} dollars
